<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions/><catalog_item display_value="Constituent Connect">bfe53424479902504f6574fc416d4337</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><published_ref/><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>false</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	var serviceType = g_form.getValue('select_service_type');

    if (serviceType == '1') {
        alert("This is a service request");
    } else if (serviceType == '2') {
        alert("This is a info request");
    } else if (serviceType == '3') {
        alert("This is a license or permit request");
    }

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	var serviceType = g_form.getValue('select_service_type');

    if (serviceType == '1') {
        alert("This is a service request");
    } else if (serviceType == '2') {
        alert("This is a info request");
    } else if (serviceType == '3') {
        alert("This is a license or permit request");
    }

}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Show Service Selector based on Service Type</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jspirko</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-14 02:42:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>67e4e721ebed02105204f635cad0cdad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Service Selector based on Service Type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="15-Minute Service MVP" source="x_snc_15_minute_se">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="15-Minute Service MVP">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_67e4e721ebed02105204f635cad0cdad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jspirko</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-14 03:33:43</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
